metadata.title: Jopy hä kja (inkjë hë rê pïri jopy)

sentences.transcription: ra pjôntwê tän [rapa] rapa [më] swasêri mä
sotinpe hä pjo, rê pja tä jïsün mära hä
ti söjoppjâ tajïn hyrihë rê sünswâri
tä rênkjäri inkjë hë, ra tepinkwapy
raatâttän, rapa tän, hasê hamä rapa tän.
sentences.notes: raatâttän = when i was strong; hasê = mato sujo

sentences.transcription: mämän pên, jy mänkjö rakwyy, mära mä
ti tä raanpün pyssy hä, japên rê kjäto [kjäto] hakoko
sentences.notes: rê kjäto hakoko = split nut (ti kusy, ti jopôô pyssy)

sentences.transcription: hakün, ti järërä hê pjy sâti

sentences.notes: kriti = kriti hë; ta rakrëë = quase comeu

sentences.transcription: kö rakwyy sï mämä, ti më pïnjasêri.
mämän pên rê rïnpari hatte pên
nänsi ippëë pankjâ, [karê, nänsi sy] nänsi soppëë pjo, sïsârï, ti sotontwa pjo, swankjarân
sentences.notes: very mumbly bumbly, tough to hear with multiple misspeaks (so probably ultimately not quite grammatical) [GLOSSING IS FUTILE]

sentences.transcription: rê soppaa rapjârân tajïn, sotanka paa rapjârân

sentences.translation: ele correu rápido para pegar o arco

sentences.transcription: rênkjäri kjä pan mä ranswâri prïhara
hï jattä kypy rê mÿn hapan hï

sentences.notes: fork to different river distributary. Consultant's notes (Pêrankô) suggest that this is used as a road, and its meeting is that of an intersection on a path. (pên is being used ablatively within the verb complex)

sentences.transcription: ti mÿn raakjün mämän hë kjänsiha hë jopy hë
mÿn ti mÿn raakjün sâpïri jan

sentences.notes: intakjakriti = name of a kind of wood that grows in the rainy season

sentences.transcription: py jatoo kri kôpy rênkjän häkwa
sentences.notes: ja not jy ha? py ja too = apareceu de novo
he thinks to himself, i must be laying

sentences.transcription: kjëräpjâ pytinsi jy ra suppôô kjati
pjän hë ti kawajära krii tijää
mämän pên ti më pïn jajïn
mämän pjâharân tajïn raty hapjârân rê rappjö
sentences.notes: maybe mämänpjârân; he killed a jaguar and the spirits came to haunt him

sentences.transcription: jan, jan ta raty inkjë, jan ta raty.
tâta mä su rêjïn tê mänpe mä su
jan [rê] jan rê pïri kriti, kriti
ti kin ho rakjari, kjëräpjâ hë, ti kin ho rakjari söpää japê
rê raapjâri pjönpjö sê pää pytinsi ho
[ha] mära rê ho pyttën, rê ra ho pyttën
maja hä rakän tä jïsün inkjë hë jopy
inkô mä kujasâri, inkô mä kujasâri

sentences.notes: he's coming to find it; ky~kwy
calling out to see where the other person

sentences.transcription: rê ho tâta mä rê paa
paa rê ho tâta mä rê paa rê rankjää
japjâra, haswa py rappa hapjâra. mämän pên
hüwätün [py ra kâ] jy ra kâkwyy kajïn

sentences.notes: pyrê - vamos (wants with other py though)
suty ~ kwati suu (palha) (i don't understand what he's saying here)
pëpyti = forest dwarves??? short people-like things that live in the forest. v scary, aggressive
ka kriti = it will be my pet

sentences.transcription: jahë taa ra kjäkwâri, taa ra pïri
[ja p] ja rê pïri, [ja] ja rê ho rö sisu kriti
mämä ka sün, mära ta rê rapên
sentences.notes: commentary about the fact that he hadn't seen this; the extra rä/tä might be an old people thing; this ta is short for suresies

sentences.transcription: haa jahä suu ra tä rankwajäri ja, ja
hë jahä suu ratä rankwajäri mämä karê ku

sentences.notes: peanuts are very important?; rattä ränkwajä = fix up/make okay

sentences.transcription: märê rê ra kâkkâri ja, mäja
jahä pyttän [ra kâ] rê ra krâsyri ja

sentences.notes: sâpjâ = sö tönpy (his brother); it's not kjakjô, it's just a lot of saliva

sentences.transcription: haa, sâpjâ jakjô hë ti ra krâsyri ja mühë
ra rökwyy tajïn më, ra rökwyy
ra pjynpüränkjân rêpy ratöppjâri pjo ja, inkjon
sentences.notes: ra pjynnpüränkjân = nunca vi mais a trilha

sentences.transcription: tän mähë mämän, mämän jy kâkjên pija
mämähë kâkjên inkjon tän rakwyy më
sentences.notes: kâkjên kjon tän = back when no pants
mesmo dia fez o escarificação; unsure if mära hamä

sentences.transcription: tä rênkwajäri swankjarân, inkjë hë rê sotaranpün jahä, nönpên hä
sentences.notes: swankjara rênkwajäri = pëëntwê ""rêwajäri""; unsure of rê
isso que tô falando pra vcs; orthographically nasalize i?

sentences.transcription: nä ta rê mä hasê tâti
ha, rapjôntwê tän [rakö rap] rakö rapa
[ruhô] ja, ja hamä [su kjê] [ka kjakkâ] kjakkâkjên ja hamä

sentences.notes: rannänkaa?; nänkaa têê has to do with the killing someone then getting scarified
said after the bottom lip skin is taken out

sentences.transcription: rê rakö raakâri, rê tä raanpün
haa ja ra känsün, ja ra känsün
